titleStmt.title: A merry iest of Iohn Tomson, and Iakaman his vvife: vvhose iealousie was justly, the cause all their strife. To the tune of Pegge of Ramsey.
titleStmt.author: M. L., fl. 1637.

notesStmt.note: In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
